mapper.select: SELECT lastName,firstName,addr1,addr2,zipcode,tel,userid FROM member m JOIN memberinfo i ON m.memberidx=i.memberidx WHERE m.memberidx= #{memberIdx}
SELECT productName FROM product WHERE productIdx=#{productIdx}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT accountNo ,TO_CHAR(createDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')createDate FROM account WHERE memberIdx=#{memberIdx} AND status=1 ORDER BY createDate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM=1
SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) FROM transaction t JOIN account a ON t.accountNo=a.accountNo WHERE t.ttype=0 AND a.memberIdx=#{memberIdx} AND a.productIdx=3 AND a.status=1

SELECT productName,a.accountNo,TO_CHAR((tr.trDate),'YYYY-MM-DD') createDate, TO_CHAR((tr.trDate)+364,'YYYY-MM-DD') lastDate,amount AS lendMoney ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tr.trDate+45),'dd')interestDate,l.interest, getCurrentBalance(a.accountNo) AS balance FROM account a JOIN transaction t ON a.accountNo=t.accountNo JOIN product p ON a.productIdx = p.productIdx JOIN trDetail tr ON t.trDetailIdx = tr.trDetailIdx JOIN loanproduct l ON a.productIdx = l.productIdx WHERE memberIdx=#{memberIdx} AND a.productIdx=3 AND ttype=0 AND a.status=1
